dct_description_sm: UCLA has: 1691 (2nd edition); 1697 (4th edition); 1705 (7th edition); 1713 (8th edition).  BL has: 1691 (2nd edition); 1697 (4th edition); 1704 (6th edition).

California with slightly indented northern coast, no place names and labeled California I.  Western Canada is called N. Walles.  Area to the northwest called Compagnie L.On page below a map of Africa.Sold by: T. Salusbury (lower left).H: Moll fecit (lower right).  Issued in: A most compleat compendium of geography; general and special..., Fifth edition. / By Laurence Echard. -- London : Printed for J. Nicholson, [1700], following [p.] 150.  Also published in 1691, 1697, 1705, and 1713.Reissued in: A most compleat compendium of geography: general and special..., Sixth edition. / By Laurence Echard. -- London, 1704.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Glen McLaughlin Map Collection of California as an Island courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
